headline: RTX vs. L3Harris: Which Aerospace-Defense Stock Offers More Firepower?
summary: RTX edges out LHX with stronger short-term solvency, commercial growth and a better 2025 earnings outlook despite a higher debt load.

headline: L3Harris Technologies Tapped for $175B Golden Dome System
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) rallied by as much as 4% on May 21 as President Donald Trump’s administration announced plans to build the Golden Dome missile defense system that leverages its satellites. The $175 billion defense system is slated for completion in less than three years. The aerospace and defense company has carved a niche […]

headline: L3HARRIS MARKS MAJOR MILESTONE FOR NEW SOLID ROCKET MOTOR 'FACTORIES OF THE FUTURE' IN VIRGINIA
summary: CULPEPER - L3Harris Technologies has broken ground on the construction of five new solid rocket motor facilities in Virginia that will boost production to support key national defense programs.The...
